code: import React from'react';import Card from'./Card';import Button from'./Button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddressCard=_ref=>{let{address,onEdit,onDelete,onSetDefault,isProcessing}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"mb-4 relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-start",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center mb-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-semibold text-lg mr-2",children:address.label||'배송지'}),address.is_default&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-indigo-500 text-white text-xs px-2 py-0.5 rounded ml-1",children:"\uAE30\uBCF8"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-700 mb-1",children:[address.recipient," | ",address.phone]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",children:["[",address.zip_code,"] ",address.address1," ",address.address2]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col gap-2 items-end ml-4",children:[!address.is_default&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",variant:"outline",onClick:()=>onSetDefault(address.id),isLoading:isProcessing==='setDefault',children:"\uAE30\uBCF8\uC124\uC815"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",variant:"outline",onClick:()=>onEdit(address),disabled:isProcessing==='edit',children:"\uC218\uC815"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",variant:"danger",onClick:()=>onDelete(address.id),isLoading:isProcessing==='delete',children:"\uC0AD\uC81C"})]})]})});};export default AddressCard;
